test_cases.test_case_description: Advertiser registration with valid data and OTP verification followed by first login and profile view
preconditions: Valid phone/email available to receive OTP

test_steps.action: Open Advertiser app and navigate to Registration
Enter valid name, email, phone, and password; submit
Receive OTP and enter within valid time window
Login with registered credentials
Open Profile and view details

test_cases.expected_results: Registration succeeds; OTP verification completes; login succeeds; profile displays correct registered information.

test_cases.test_case_description: Advertiser registration negative and boundary validations including OTP expiry and invalid formats

test_steps.action: Open Registration
Submit with missing required fields
Submit with invalid email format
Submit with weak password
Request OTP, wait past expiry, then submit OTP
Enter incorrect OTP thrice

test_cases.expected_results: Appropriate validation errors; OTP expired is rejected; multiple incorrect OTP attempts are rejected without creating account.

boundary.note: Minimum length boundary as per policy (assumption)

test_cases.comments: Exact OTP expiry window not specified—see assumptions.

test_cases.test_case_description: Advertiser password reset via 'forgot password'
preconditions: Advertiser account exists and is active

test_steps.action: Open Login and tap 'Forgot password'
Enter registered email
Complete verification (link/OTP)
Set new valid password and login

test_cases.expected_results: Reset email/OTP received; password successfully reset; user can log in with new password and not with old one.

test_cases.test_case_description: Advertiser can update profile fields and see persistence

test_steps.action: Open Profile
Edit company name and phone and save
Logout and login to verify persisted changes

test_cases.expected_results: Profile updates save and persist across sessions.

test_cases.test_case_description: Advertiser views wallet balance and transaction history
preconditions: Advertiser has at least one past transaction

test_steps.action: Navigate to Wallet
Observe balance and transaction list
Tap into a transaction to view details

test_cases.expected_results: Balance reflects sum of transactions; history shows accurate items with correct amounts and timestamps.

test_cases.test_case_description: Recharge wallet using JAZZ CASH successfully
preconditions: Advertiser logged in; payment gateway sandbox available

test_steps.action: Open Wallet > Recharge
Choose JAZZ CASH and enter valid amount
Complete payment in gateway flow
Return to app and verify balance updated and transaction recorded

test_cases.expected_results: Payment succeeds; wallet credited; transaction recorded with reference ID.

test_cases.test_case_description: Recharge wallet using valid voucher; invalid and reused voucher negative cases
preconditions: Advertiser logged in; one unused valid voucher and one used/invalid voucher exist

test_steps.action: Open Wallet > Voucher Recharge
Enter valid voucher code and submit
Verify balance increases and transaction recorded
Attempt to reuse the same voucher
Enter invalid/nonexistent voucher

test_cases.expected_results: Valid voucher credits wallet; reused/invalid vouchers are rejected with clear errors; no double credit.

test_cases.test_case_description: Create campaign with all required parameters including multiple images; validation on parameters
preconditions: Advertiser logged in; wallet has sufficient balance (per BR-2)

test_steps.action: Open Create Campaign form
Enter title, description, duration, number of cars, target area, budget; add 3 images
Submit form
Observe campaign moves to Pending/Active per workflow

test_cases.expected_results: Campaign created; validations pass for required fields and images; campaign visible in relevant list.
test_cases.comments: Status transitions not fully specified—see gaps.

test_cases.test_case_description: View active, pending, and completed campaign lists; tracking driver current locations
preconditions: Advertiser has at least one campaign in each state and drivers assigned

test_steps.action: Open Campaigns > Active; verify list and counts
Open Campaigns > Pending; verify items
Open Campaigns > Completed; verify items
From an active campaign, open map to track driver locations

test_cases.expected_results: Lists display correct items; map shows drivers for selected campaign with live positions.

test_cases.test_case_description: Advertiser contacts customer support and inquires driver status

test_steps.action: Open Support and send a general inquiry
Use driver status inquiry flow referencing a campaign/driver

test_cases.expected_results: Support request is sent and acknowledged; driver status inquiry returns current status or generates a ticket.

test_cases.test_case_description: Driver registration, login, and sign out

test_steps.action: Register as driver with valid details
Login with credentials
Sign out and verify session cleared

test_cases.expected_results: Registration and login succeed; sign out clears session and returns to login.

test_cases.test_case_description: Driver views and updates profile; uploads vehicle images

test_steps.action: Open Profile and view info
Update car type and license number; save
Upload front, side, rear vehicle images

test_cases.expected_results: Profile updates persist; images upload and are visible with thumbnails.

test_cases.test_case_description: Driver receives campaign request and accepts; alternative reject path
preconditions: Driver availability status ON; matching campaign exists

test_steps.action: Wait for campaign request notification
Open request and accept
Repeat for a second request and reject

test_cases.expected_results: Accepted request moves to assigned; rejection sends decline status; responses tracked.

test_cases.test_case_description: Driver views navigation to installation center and starts campaign after installation
preconditions: Campaign assigned and scheduled for installation

test_steps.action: Open assigned campaign and tap Navigate to installation center
Arrive and mark installed (as per flow); Admin verifies if required
Start campaign

test_cases.expected_results: Navigation opens with route; after installation verification, driver can start campaign.
test_cases.comments: Admin verification flow not fully detailed.

test_cases.test_case_description: Driver records campaign activity and uploads verification images with location metadata

test_steps.action: Open campaign activity screen and start activity timer
Capture verification photo at checkpoint
Submit with auto-attached location data
View verification history list

test_cases.expected_results: Activity recorded; image captured; location lat/long stored and verified; activity appears in history.

test_cases.test_case_description: Driver views wallet balance and earnings history
preconditions: Driver has completed at least one campaign with earnings

test_steps.action: Open Wallet
Verify balance and earnings entries

test_cases.expected_results: Balance matches sum of verified participations; entries show campaign IDs and amounts.

test_cases.test_case_description: Driver accesses help center and contacts support

test_steps.action: Open Help Center
Search for 'installation' help article
Submit a support ticket

test_cases.expected_results: Help content displays; ticket created with a reference number and visible in support status.

test_cases.test_case_description: Admin login, password reset and role-based access verification
preconditions: Admin accounts exist with roles: SuperAdmin, OpsAdmin

test_steps.action: Login as OpsAdmin and verify accessible menus
Attempt to access restricted SuperAdmin pages
Use forgot password to reset OpsAdmin password and login with new password

test_cases.expected_results: Role-limited access enforced; restricted pages blocked; password reset works.

test_cases.test_case_description: Admin user management for admins and drivers (add, update, delete, block/unblock, profile creation, notifications/emails)

test_steps.action: Add a new admin account and update its details
Delete a test admin
Add a driver and create driver profile
Block and then unblock a driver
Send notification and email to a driver and advertiser

test_cases.expected_results: All CRUD operations succeed; block state enforced; notifications/emails sent and logged.

test_cases.test_case_description: Admin campaign search, activation, start from installation, and trial completion
preconditions: Admin logged in; campaigns exist in various states; drivers assigned to some

test_steps.action: Search campaigns and users by multiple criteria
Activate a pending campaign
Start driver campaign from installation center
Complete driver trial and verify status update

test_cases.expected_results: Search works; campaign activated; driver campaign started; trials completed with correct status changes.

test_cases.test_case_description: Admin configuration of coupons, vouchers, car types, and installation centers

test_steps.action: Add a coupon, update it, and then delete
Add a voucher, update it, and then delete
Add a car type, update it, and then delete
Add an installation center and edit its details

test_cases.expected_results: All configuration entities support add/update/delete (except centers deletion if restricted); changes persist.

test_cases.test_case_description: System matches campaigns to appropriate drivers and sends requests; track responses
preconditions: Active campaign created with target area; multiple drivers with varying locations and availability

test_steps.action: Trigger assignment for campaign
Verify only drivers in proximity and available receive requests
Capture accept/reject responses and response times

test_cases.expected_results: Eligible drivers receive requests; ineligible do not; responses are tracked per driver.

test_cases.test_case_description: Monitor campaign progress in real-time and enforce time/distance constraints
preconditions: Active campaign with specified time window and minimum distance/coverage

test_steps.action: Start driver campaign and simulate movement
Validate real-time progress metrics update
Breach time window and/or distance threshold to verify enforcement

test_cases.expected_results: Real-time metrics reflect movement; out-of-policy conditions are flagged and prevented from crediting beyond constraints.

test_cases.test_case_description: Campaign performance reports, heat maps, duration and location tracking
preconditions: Completed campaign with sufficient movement and verification data

test_steps.action: Open Reports for completed campaign
View heat map and verify concentration in target areas
Check duration and location logs for accuracy

test_cases.expected_results: Reports generated; heat map aligns with route data; durations and locations match tracking logs.

test_cases.test_case_description: Process wallet recharge transactions and maintain records; failure handling

test_steps.action: Initiate recharge and approve payment
Verify transaction record created with success state
Initiate recharge and cancel/decline in gateway
Verify no credit and record shows failure

test_cases.expected_results: Successful transactions credit wallet and log success; declined payments do not credit and log failure.

test_cases.test_case_description: Calculate driver earnings based on campaign participation and verification
preconditions: Driver completed activities; some verified, some unverified

test_steps.action: Run earnings calculation for campaign period
Verify only verified participations are paid
Validate amounts per pricing model inputs (duration, cars, location)

test_cases.expected_results: Earnings include only verified participation; amounts calculated per business rules.
test_cases.comments: Exact pricing formula not detailed—see gaps.

test_cases.test_case_description: Apply discount coupons to advertiser and validate coupon/voucher logic

test_steps.action: Apply valid coupon on campaign creation/payment
Apply expired/invalid coupon
Reapply same coupon if single-use

test_cases.expected_results: Valid coupons reduce payable amount per rule; invalid/expired/single-use reapply rejected.

test_cases.test_case_description: Real-time location tracking of drivers and map display for active campaigns
preconditions: Active campaign; advertisers and admin can view

test_steps.action: Driver app sends periodic GPS updates while moving
Advertiser opens map on campaign
Select a specific driver to track

test_cases.expected_results: Location updates appear on map with near-real-time markers; specific driver selection focuses the map.

test_cases.test_case_description: Record driver routes, analyze movement patterns, detect route deviations
preconditions: Route baseline/expected path defined for campaign

test_steps.action: Simulate driver following expected route
Simulate deviation off-route
Open analytics to view pattern analysis and deviation alerts

test_cases.expected_results: Routes recorded; movement patterns generated; deviations flagged with timestamps and segments.

test_cases.test_case_description: Create and track support tickets; status transitions

test_steps.action: Submit a new support ticket
View ticket status as Open
Admin updates ticket to In Progress then Resolved
Verify user can see updated status

test_cases.expected_results: Ticket created with reference; status updates reflect in user view; history is preserved.

test_cases.test_case_description: FCM notifications and emails are sent and communication logs maintained
preconditions: Push tokens and email settings configured

test_steps.action: Trigger a system event (campaign assignment)
Verify push notification received on driver device
Send email to advertiser from admin portal
Open communication logs and verify entries

test_cases.expected_results: Push and email delivered within expected SLAs; logs capture type, recipient, timestamp, and status.

Verify presence of key fields and widgets per screen

test_cases.expected_results: All specified screens exist and contain required fields/controls.

test_steps.action: Navigate through all listed driver screens
Verify key fields and widgets per screen

test_cases.expected_results: All specified driver screens exist and contain required controls.

test_steps.action: Visit each admin portal screen
Verify presence of required components

test_cases.expected_results: All specified admin screens exist and contain required components.

test_cases.test_case_description: Android minimum version and hardware access for GPS, camera, storage

test_steps.action: Install app on Android 6.0 and launch
Grant/deny GPS and Camera permissions and test features
Capture photo and persist data to storage

test_cases.expected_results: App runs on Android 6.0+; features require permissions; without permissions feature is disabled and prompts are shown.

test_cases.test_case_description: Presence of car advertisement displays and installation equipment at centers

test_steps.action: Verify car display mount points and equipment checklist at center

test_cases.expected_results: Required hardware interfaces exist and are documented for installation workflow.

test_cases.test_case_description: External services integrations use correct protocols, formats, and authentication
preconditions: Test credentials for AWS, Firebase, Google Maps, JAZZ CASH

test_steps.action: Inspect network calls for HTTPS and JSON formatting
Validate AWS IAM/API keys usage for hosting endpoints
Validate Firebase Auth for realtime
Validate Google Maps API key usage
Validate payment gateway authentication

test_cases.expected_results: All integrations use specified protocols, data formats, and authentication schemes.

test_cases.test_case_description: Internal components use HTTPS JSON with JWT auth and DB SQL with credentials

test_steps.action: Call backend APIs from apps and verify Authorization: Bearer <JWT>
Observe DB connections use configured credentials and proper SQL operations

test_cases.expected_results: APIs over HTTPS with JWT; DB accessed via authenticated SQL connections.

test_cases.test_case_description: System uses HTTPS, WebSockets, FCM, and SMTP as specified

test_steps.action: Verify API calls are over HTTPS
Verify realtime channels use WebSockets/HTTPS for Firebase
Trigger push and verify FCM transport
Send an email and verify SMTP used by mailer service

test_cases.expected_results: All communications occur via specified protocols.
